pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.1: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.2: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.11:2.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.11:2.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajanti—
